name: Skittertalk
summary: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with spiders and other arachnids.
description:
You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with spiders and other arachnids. The GM determines which creatures count for this ability.Traits

Anadi: Anadis are peaceful, reclusive humanoids who live deep within woodlands, jungles, and other untamed areas of wilderness. Their natural forms resemble humanoid spiders covered in beautiful and distinctive markings of varying colors.
